response.original_title: At Home in Kobe: Soccer Star Andrés Iniesta
response.overview: Soccer player Andrés Iniesta has had a stellar career as part of FC Barcelona and later as captain of Japanese squad Vissel Kobe, where he guided the team to great success. During his five years in Kobe, he developed a deep affection for the city and its tenacious inhabitants, a feeling that was returned by droves of supporters who see the team as a symbol of the city's rebirth after the major earthquake there in 1995.
response.title: At Home in Kobe: Soccer Star Andrés Iniesta
